pkgmetadata.longdescription: # pyrymproA python library to communitcate with [Read Your Meter Pro](https://rym-pro.com/).## InstallationYou can install pyvolumio from [PyPI](https://pypi.org/project/pyvolumio/): pip3 install pyrymproPython 3.7 and above are supported.## How to use```pythonfrom pyrympro import RymProrym = RymPro()# you can also pass in your own sessionrym = RymPro(session)# device_id can be anything you chooseawait rym.login("<email>", "<password>", "<device_id>")info = await rym.account_info()meter_reads = await rym.last_read()...```
